Description:
A Home To Make Your Own
On a large 637sqm (approx.) block, this quiet street is surrounded by everything that the northern suburbs have to offer, a short walk to Corio Central Shopping Centre, Northern Bay College Hendy & Wexford Campuses, St Francis Xavier Primary, and many public transport options. Access to the Ring Road is only minutes away bringing Melbourne's CBD within an hour & Geelong CBD an easy 15 minutes!
Large sunlit lounge with polished floorboards, wall A/C & ceiling fan
Adjoining kitchen/meals area with gas, stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher, abundance of storage & feature bay window
3 good sized bedrooms with polished floorboards, all with mirrored built in robes and ceiling fans
Secure carport with electric remote roller door
Large, paved undercover entertaining alfresco
Spacious backyard with combination of large grassed area & fernery
Rear man-cave/bungalow lined with power and Coonara heater
Ducted heating throughout
Huge 637sqm block & sprinkler system in front yard
External roller shutters on all meals/living/bedroom windows
Potential rent return of $310-$330 per week
A great opportunity for a first home buyer to make their own or an investor to enjoy a steady return.
Insights: 16 Atami Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Expansive 5 bedroom family home
This sprawling five-bedroom residence ticks all the boxes, making it a great family home or investment. Boasting multiple living areas including a formal lounge with study, large open plan living room, dining area and kitchen at the heart of the home, there is plenty of room for everyone. The open-plan living is centred around the kitchen featuring a breakfast bar, dishwasher and plenty of storage including a large pantry, which opens out to the dining and living areas and further again outside to the paved patio for entertaining family and friends. Four of the five bedrooms offer built in robes, the master is complete with walk in robe and full ensuite. The main bathroom offers a bath, separate shower and a separate toilet for added convenience. Additional features include a double garage with through roller door, ducted heating throughout the home and two split system air conditioners. Nestled in a quiet location, you can be on the Geelong Ring Road in just a few minutes making for an easy commute to Melbourne or down the coast. Located within walking distance to the local shops, Corio Village, schools and public transport links, this property is sure to appeal to growing families and astute investors alike
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 15 Kingsley Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern & Spacious Family Home
Located on the fringe of the ever popular Cloverdale Estate, this family home sits on 570sqm (approx.) with public transport at your fingertips, minutes away from Northern Bay College, Corio Central Shopping Centre, entrance to the Ring Road, which brings Melbourne within an hour, Geelongs CBD just 15 mins and the Surfcoast in about half an hour. This home has been renovated with all new floor coverings, LED lights throughout, new kitchen with appliances, bathroom vanities and toilets
* 3 great sized bedrooms, all with built in robes (master with walk in robe and ensuite)
* Large lounge with split system heating/cooling
* Stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances inc. gas cooktop & dishwasher
* Main bathroom has separate bath & shower with adjacent separate toilet
* Enclosed, paved wrap around alfresco area perfect for entertaining
* Double garage with sectioned off workshop/multi purpose room
* Additional shedding/storage at the rear of the garage
* Large yard
* Currently tenanted month by month at $330 per week (perfect if someone wishes to move into the property)
Homes that offer this much are rare, dont miss out!
Insights: 177 Princess Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfectly positioned.
This fantastic brick home sitting on a 557sqm (approx.) allotment is well suited to a range of purchasers, from first home buyer, renovators or investors alike.
The property itself offers three comfortable sized bedrooms, two with built in robes, a central bathroom and plenty of storage space throughout the home. The open plan kitchen and dining area provides lots of bench and cupboard space and includes a gas stove. Adjacent to the kitchen is a light filled lounge room perfect for entertaining friends or family.
Step outside to the rear of the home and you are greeted by a large low maintenance backyard complete with a single car garage and a cubby house perfect for those with children or pets.
Close to local schools, Corio shopping centre, public transport and the Melbourne ring road practically at your door this property is a great investment which is sure to bring a solid return. Don't miss your chance to inspect today.
Insights: 337 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Move Straight In
Set on a generous allotment of approx. 708m2, this comfortable three bedroom family home is in fantastic condition and is a great opportunity for families and investors alike. Walking distance to schools, shops and minutes to the Ring Road.
- Separate formal lounge and dining room
- Family meals area flows to outdoor area
- Updated kitchen with dishwasher and stainless appliances
- Three generous bedrooms with built in robes
- Large rear yard features stunning gardens
- Workshop and studio in the large separate bungalow
- Gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling
- Ideal rental property or move straight in and enjoy
- Large flat block could be subdivided (S.T.C.A)

Description:
Low maintenance & excellent location.
Positioned in a leafy pocket lies this beautiful three bedroom family home. Adding to the appeal is the beautiful presentation which provides, investors, families and couples an excellent opportunity. The home features three spacious bedrooms with built in robes, large open lounge/dining area, bright spacious kitchen which adjoins the meals/family room. Additionally there is gas cooking, air conditioning, ceiling fans and a dishwasher. Outside there is plenty of space for the kids to play safely, room for the tools in the garden shed, a double car garage and a double carport. Located close to the Corio shopping precinct, Stead Park, Geelong Grammar School and of course the Ring Road for easy access.

Attention First Home Buyers & Investors
Set in one of the most sought after locations in Corio, close to schools, kindergartens, sporting facilities, major shopping precinct and within quick and easy access of the Geelong Ring Road is this 3 bedroom family home ready for its new owner to move in and unpack! Updated kitchen, large open lounge/living area with split system cooling, polished floorboards throughout, sunroom at the back and a central bathroom plus a large rear yard with plenty of room for entertaining. This home will suit first home buyers, downsizers & investors alike. Don't miss out and inspect today.
- Located in sought after area
- 3 good-sized bedrooms
- Quick and easy access to Geelong Ring Rd & Princes Hwy

Description:
"Quality Built & Spacious Living!"
This quality built family home located in the Sought after Rosepark Estate offers spacious living on a large 562m2 (approx allotment). This home offers a comfortable, convenient & quiet living in a popular street.
This bright family home offers a well thought out floor plan consisting of 3 bedrooms with walk in robe & ensuite to complete the master, additional bedrooms offer built in robes.
2 Separate living areas plus study. Open plan living offering decent proportions for the modern family. Kitchen showcases ample bench space, stone benchtops & modern appliances.
Large landscaped yards and alfresco with cafe blinds for the entertainers. This home is energy efficient with its 8 x 1.5kw solar panels with a 2kw inverter system, capped at an amazing rate of 66c until 2024.
Within walking distance to schools & parks, just a short drive to the Corio Shopping center, kindergartens & major amenities. Commuters, feel at ease with access to the ring road within a 3-minute drive.
Key Features
3 Bedrooms plus study
2 Living areas
2 Bathrooms
Double garage with automatic roller door
Gas Ducted Heating & Evaporative Cooling
Stainless steel wall oven, cooktop & dishwasher
Large concreted Alfresco with cafe blinds & tv bracket
Fully landscaped front and rear yards
Concreted at the right side of home for easy access through the gate
Downlights feature in main living areas
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Exceptional Value! Ideal First Home or Downsizing Opportunity!
This fantastic brick home sitting on a 557sqm (approx.) allotment is well suited to a range of purchasers, from first home buyer, renovators or investors alike.
The property itself offers three comfortable sized bedrooms, all with built in robes, a central bathroom with separate toilet and plenty of storage space throughout the home. The open plan kitchen and dining area provides lots of bench and cupboard space and includes an electric stovetop and oven. Adjacent to the kitchen is a light filled lounge room perfect for entertaining friends or family.
Step outside to the rear of the home and you are greeted by a large low maintenance backyard complete with a massive double lock up garage and undercover entertaining area.
Close to local schools, Corio shopping centre, public transport and the Melbourne ring road practically at your door this property is a great investment which is sure to bring a solid return. Don't miss your chance to inspect today.

Description:
Resort Style Living on 1/3 Acre!
Every day will feel like a holiday while living at this spectacular lifestyle property! Situated on a massive 1332m2 block (approx), overlooking Lovely Banks and within a short distance to schools, shops, public transport and the freeway.
The magnificent residence offers 3 spacious bedrooms, a massive master suite upstairs with his and hers walk-in robes, huge ensuite, split system air conditioner and ceiling fan, remaining bedrooms feature built in robes and ceiling fans. There are two living areas in the home with a spacious front lounge room with gas log fireplace, split system, bay window and ornate cornices and huge open plan living and dining room showcasing exposed timber ceilings and offering a further gas log fireplace and 2 split system air conditioners.
Vast kitchen offers stone benches, an abundance of bench and cupboard space, dishwasher, 900mm cooking appliances and corner pantry.
Directly off the home there is a large undercover entertainment area with built-in barbeque which overlooks the gorgeous in-ground solar heated pool, 6 seater spa under a Balinese hut and sauna.
Entertainers will rejoice with an additional dwelling offering a massive man cave complete with bar, rumpus room, 4th bedroom with its own ensuite and storage area.
Double garage with panel lift door with side gated access to easily store additional vehicles.
This property has it all and is ready for you to move in!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
The ultimate in modern family living.
Located in the rapidly expanding and ever popular suburb of Corio lies this beautiful family home. Showcasing incredible street appeal and with only the highest quality materials and finishes. From the moment you walk through the front door, your jaw will hit the floor.
The impressive floor-plan features three generously sized bedrooms, with the master suite incorporating a walk-in wardrobe and an absolutely perfect ensuite. With the other two bedrooms also including built in wardrobes. A huge open plan living, dining and kitchen area flooded with natural light, featuring stone benchtops and quality appliances compliment the home.
An absolutely stunning family central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry room with huge amounts of storage space complete the internal layout of this home. Outside, straight off the impressive living room, you will find an undercover entertaining area complete with above ground pool and manicured lawns and gardens.
An amazing home in a perfect family friendly location with ease of access to shopping centres, recreation clubs, schools and the Princes Highway within easy reach. If you have been looking for the perfect home where you literally turn the key, move in and start living that amazing lifestyle we are all chasing, then look no further than this.

Description:
A Fabulous Family Entertainer
In the heart of Cloverdale we present this charming family home made for entertaining. The renovated kitchen with ample bench space, dishwasher and an expansive box-bay style window (the perfect servery to the huge outdoor entertainment area). Flow through the large dining area through the sliding doors to the alfresco area where pull down blinds mean entertaining can happen year round. With a large lounge, full en suite to the master bedroom plus walk-in-robe, the other 2 bedrooms are comfortable and accommodating. Centrally heated, with an air conditioner plus ceiling fans the home not only presents well but is comfortable too. Outside entertain anytime, have the kids playing in the backyard on the 618 sqm allotment and with a double garage there is also an abundance of space for more cars or toys. Located in a quiet court in Corio's most sought after neighbourhood with schools, shops & transport close by plus easy access to the Ring Road. Don't let your family miss out on this pristine family home.

Description:
In a quiet court location.
The location simply doesn't get much better than this. This much-loved home is situated just a short walking distance to the local sporting grounds and with Corio Shopping Centre, local schools and the Melbourne ring road only a few minutes away this great property will not last long.
Barry Plant are proud to present this rare opportunity to secure this family home that boasts a flexible floor plan that can cater for all buyers. It includes 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, a comfortable lounge upon entry with gas heating, and a kitchen and dining area which features plenty of storage.
Leading out to the rear of the home is an undercover alfresco area which is perfect for entertaining in the summer months with the inclusion of a small garden shed, all positioned on a huge 653m2 (approx.) block.
Click that get in touch button and enquire today!

Description:
Investment opportunity.
If you are looking for an investment property or potential future development site (STCA) this is the property for you. Set on a generous allotment of 710m2 (approx.) this is the perfect opportunity.
Comprising of two cosy bedrooms, this welcoming home offers a spacious lounge upon entry with a gas heater. A bright and updated kitchen provides room for a meals area and features lots of cupboard space and a gas oven. The centrally located bathroom is close by the bedrooms while the W/C is situated opposite the separate laundry.
Located only a few minutes drive to Corio Central shopping centre, a short walk to Stead Park and seconds away from the Princes Highway. Be sure to enquire quickly as this one will not last long.

Description:
Well loved two bedroom home.
Presenting one of the best homes Corio has to offer. This fantastic opportunity will not last long as it is perfectly suited for a range of purchasers, from the first home buyer, downsizer or investor looking to add to their portfolio.
This home features beautiful polished tiles that run throughout the entire home, two well sized bedrooms, with the main including direct entry into the bathroom and a WIR, a large living area and study nook, gas heater, split system air conditioning and a well presented kitchen/dining area which has plenty of cupboard space and an electric stove top.
Outside an undercover alfresco area looks onto the well maintained and low maintenance yard with plenty of room for entertaining. Other features include a remote single car garage and roller security shutters.
Location is important when buying a home and it really doesn't get much better than this. With schools, Corio Shopping Centre and recreation parks only a few minutes drive away. Inspect today before missing out.

Description:
Gorgeous 3 bedroom home.
Boasting character and charm this incredibly neat three bedroom home situated on a generous 613m2 (approx.) allotment could be exactly what you've been searching for! Currently occupied by fantastic tenants till late 2019 providing investors an amazing opportunity to secure this place in the growing suburb of Corio.
Complete with an attractive facade, that features a veranda, white trim and bay window, the home possesses a light filled interior through out with a functional floorplan. At the heart of the home, a spacious main living room opens up to the practical kitchen and adjoining meals area. All three bedrooms can be found off the main hall close to the central bathroom and separate W/C. Enjoy entertaining outside in the extensive undercover alfresco overlooking the grassed rear yard complete with SLUG.
Located just minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, parks & reserves. Easy access to public transport with bus stops just around the corner and the Princes Highway close by means just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's waterfront and CBD.
Immaculately presented and well cared for this charming home offers an amazing amount of potential for its new owners.
** PLEASE NOTE: Photos used for advertising are from the previous sale of the home. Please call to inspect the property in person and its current condition.
